name: Bulbasaur
description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
abilities.description: Ups GRASS moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during strong sunlight.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

name: Ivysaur

abilities.description: Boosts Sp. Atk, but lowers HP in sunshine.

description: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

name: Squirtle
description: Shoots water at prey while in the water. Withdraws into its shell when in danger.

abilities.description: Ups WATER moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.effect: This Pokémon heals for 1/16 of its maximum HP after each turn during rain.
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually recovers HP in rain.

name: Wartortle
description: When tapped, this POKéMON will pull in its head, but its tail will still stick out a little bit.

name: Blastoise
description: It deliberately makes itself heavy so it can withstand the recoil of the water jets it fires.

name: Caterpie
description: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is immune to the extra effects of moves used against it.  An extra effect is a move's chance, listed as an "effect chance", to inflict a status ailment, cause a stat change, or make the target flinch in addition to the move's main effect.  For example, thunder shock's paralysis is an extra effect, but thunder wave's is not, nor are knock off's item removal and air cutter's increased critical hit rate.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is always successful fleeing from wild battles, even if trapped by a move or ability.

name: Metapod
description: This POKéMON is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.effect: After each turn, this Pokémon has a 33% of being cured of any major status ailment.

name: Butterfree
description: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their accuracy.  This ability has no effect on the one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold).  Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, the chance of a wild Pokémon holding a particular item is raised from 50%, 5%, or 1% to 60%, 20%, or 5%, respectively.

abilities.name: Tinted Lens
abilities.effect: This Pokémon deals twice as much damage with moves that are not very effective against the target.

name: Weedle
description: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.

name: Kakuna
description: Almost incapable of moving, this POKéMON can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.effect: After each turn, this Pokémon has a 33% of being cured of any major status ailment.

name: Beedrill
description: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its bug-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is increased.
abilities.description: Ups BUG moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.effect: This Pokémon inflicts triple damage with critical hits, rather than the usual double damage.
abilities.description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

name: Pidgey
description: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.effect: This Pokémon cannot have its accuracy lowered.  This ability does not prevent any accuracy losses other than stat modifiers, such as the accuracy cut from fog; nor does it prevent other Pokémon's evasion from making this Pokémon's moves less accurate.  This Pokémon can still be passed negative accuracy modifiers through heart swap.  Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, any random encounter with a Pokémon five or more levels lower than it has a 50% chance of being skipped.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon is confused, it has twice its evasion.
abilities.description: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Defense cannot be lowered by other Pokémon.  This Pokémon can still be passed negative Defense modifiers through heart swap or guard swap.
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

name: Pidgeotto
description: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this POKéMON will fiercely peck at any intruder.

description: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.effect: Whenever this Pokémon is asleep, burned, paralyzed, or poisoned, it has 1.5× its Attack.  This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Attack cut from a burn.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's physical moves do 1.5× as much regular damage, but have 0.8× their usual accuracy.  Special moves are unaffected. Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, higher-levelled Pokémon have their encounter rate increased.

name: Ekans
description: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, the opponent's Attack is lowered by one stage.  In a double battle, both opponents are affected.  This ability also takes effect when acquired during a battle, but will not take effect again if lost and reobtained without leaving battle.  This ability has no effect on an opponent that has a substitute.  Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, any random encounter with a Pokémon five or more levels lower than it has a 50% chance of being skipped.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.effect: After each turn, this Pokémon has a 33% of being cured of any major status ailment.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.effect: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle.  Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.
abilities.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

name: Arbok
description: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.

This ability also takes effect when acquired during a battle, but will not take effect again if lost and reobtained without leaving battle. abilities.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

name: Pikachu
description: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being paralyzed.  Pokémon that are immune to electric-type moves can still be paralyzed by this ability.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, there is a 50% chance that encounters will be with an electric Pokémon, if applicable.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.effect: All other Pokémon's single-target electric-type moves are redirected to this Pokémon if it is an eligible target.  Other Pokémon's Electric moves raise this Pokémon's Special Attack one stage, negating any other effect on it, and cannot miss it.  If the move's intended target also has this ability, the move is not redirected.  When multiple Pokémon with this ability are possible targets for redirection, the move is redirected to the one with the highest Speed stat, or, in the case of a tie, to a random tied Pokémon.  follow me takes precedence over this ability.  If the Pokémon is a ground-type and thus immune to Electric moves, its immunity prevents the Special Attack boost.

name: Raichu
description: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.

If the Pokémon is a ground-type and thus immune to Electric moves, its immunity prevents the Special Attack boost.

name: Sandshrew
description: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.effect: During a sandstorm, this Pokémon has 1.25× its evasion, and it does not take sandstorm damage regardless of type.  The evasion bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: Sand Rush
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during a sandstorm, and it does not take sandstorm damage, regardless of type.
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.

name: Sandslash
description: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.effect: During a sandstorm, this Pokémon has 1.25× its evasion, and it does not take sandstorm damage regardless of type.  The evasion bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in a sandstorm.

abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.

name: Nidoran♀
description: Although small, its venomous barbs render this POKéMON dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being poisoned.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.effect: This Pokémon inflicts 1.25× as much regular damage against Pokémon of the same gender and 0.75× as much regular damage against Pokémon of the opposite gender.  If either Pokémon is genderless, damage is unaffected.
abilities.description: Raises Attack if the foe is of the same gender.

abilities.description: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

description: One swing of its mighty tail can snap a telephone pole as if it were a matchstick.

abilities.name: Rivalry

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's moves with extra effects have 1.3× their power, but lose their extra effects.  An effect chance is a move's chance to inflict a status ailment, cause a stat change, or make the target flinch in addition to the move's main effect. For example, thunder shock's paralysis is an extra effect, but thunder wave's is not, nor are knock off's item removal and air cutter's increased critical hit rate.  Moves that lower the user's stats are unaffected.
abilities.description: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

name: Clefairy
description: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being infatuated.  Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, any wild Pokémon whose species can be either gender has a 2/3 chance of being set to the opposite gender, and a 1/3 chance of having a random gender as usual.

abilities.name: Magic Guard
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is immune to damage not directly caused by a move.  For example, this Pokémon takes no damage from from weather, recoil, status ailments, or spikes, but it still suffers from the Attack cut when burned, and a life orb will still power up this Pokémon's moves without damaging it.  Anything that directly depends on such damage will also not happen; for example, leech seed will neither hurt this Pokémon nor heal the opponent, and Pokémon with a jaboca berry or rowap berry will not consume the berry when hit by this Pokémon.  The following are unaffected: struggle, pain split (whether used by or against this Pokémon), belly drum, substitute, curse, moves that knock the user out, and damage from confusion.  This Pokémon will neither lose nor regain HP if it drains HP from a Pokémon with liquid ooze.  If this Pokémon is badly poisoned, the poison counter is still increased each turn; if the Pokémon loses this ability, it will begin taking as much damage as it would be if it had been taking increasing damage each turn.
abilities.description: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

abilities.name: Friend Guard
abilities.effect: All friendly Pokémon take 0.75× as much direct damage from moves while this Pokémon is in battle.  This effect stacks if multiple allied Pokémon have it.

name: Clefable
description: A timid fairy POKéMON that is rarely seen. It will run and hide the moment it senses people.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being infatuated.  Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, any wild Pokémon whose species can be either gender has a 2/3 chance of being set to the opposite gender, and a 1/3 chance of having a random gender as usual.

abilities.name: Magic Guard
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is immune to damage not directly caused by a move.  For example, this Pokémon takes no damage from from weather, recoil, status ailments, or spikes, but it still suffers from the Attack cut when burned, and a life orb will still power up this Pokémon's moves without damaging it.  Anything that directly depends on such damage will also not happen; for example, leech seed will neither hurt this Pokémon nor heal the opponent, and Pokémon with a jaboca berry or rowap berry will not consume the berry when hit by this Pokémon.  The following are unaffected: struggle, pain split (whether used by or against this Pokémon), belly drum, substitute, curse, moves that knock the user out, and damage from confusion.  This Pokémon will neither lose nor regain HP if it drains HP from a Pokémon with liquid ooze.  If this Pokémon is badly poisoned, the poison counter is still increased each turn; if the Pokémon loses this ability, it will begin taking as much damage as it would be if it had been taking increasing damage each turn.
abilities.description: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

abilities.name: Unaware
abilities.effect: This Pokémon ignores other Pokémon's stat modifiers for the purposes of damage and accuracy calculation.  Effectively, this affects modifiers of every stat except Speed.  The power of punishment and stored power is calculated as usual.  When this Pokémon hurts itself in confusion, its stat modifiers affect damage as usual.
abilities.description: Ignores any change in ability by the foe.

name: Vulpix
description: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is immune to fire-type moves.  Once this Pokémon has been hit by a Fire move, its own Fire moves will inflict 1.5× as much damage until it leaves battle.  This ability has no effect while the Pokémon is frozen.  The Fire damage bonus is retained even if the Pokémon is frozen and thawed or the ability is lost or disabled.  Fire moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.  This ability takes effect even on non-damaging moves, i.e. will o wisp.
abilities.description: Powers up if hit by fire.

abilities.name: Drought
abilities.effect: The weather changes to strong sunlight when this Pokémon enters battle and does not end unless cancelled by another weather condition.  If multiple Pokémon with this ability, drizzle, sand stream, or snow warning are sent out at the same time, the abilities will activate in order of Speed, respecting trick room.  Each ability's weather will cancel the previous weather, and only the weather summoned by the slowest of the Pokémon will stay.

name: Ninetales
description: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is immune to fire-type moves.  Once this Pokémon has been hit by a Fire move, its own Fire moves will inflict 1.5× as much damage until it leaves battle.  This ability has no effect while the Pokémon is frozen.  The Fire damage bonus is retained even if the Pokémon is frozen and thawed or the ability is lost or disabled.  Fire moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.  This ability takes effect even on non-damaging moves, i.e. will o wisp.
abilities.description: Powers up if hit by fire.

abilities.name: Drought
abilities.effect: The weather changes to strong sunlight when this Pokémon enters battle and does not end unless cancelled by another weather condition.  If multiple Pokémon with this ability, drizzle, sand stream, or snow warning are sent out at the same time, the abilities will activate in order of Speed, respecting trick room.  Each ability's weather will cancel the previous weather, and only the weather summoned by the slowest of the Pokémon will stay.

name: Jigglypuff
description: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being infatuated.  Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, any wild Pokémon whose species can be either gender has a 2/3 chance of being set to the opposite gender, and a 1/3 chance of having a random gender as usual.

abilities.name: Competitive
abilities.effect: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.
abilities.description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat when a stat is lowered.

abilities.name: Friend Guard
abilities.effect: All friendly Pokémon take 0.75× as much direct damage from moves while this Pokémon is in battle.  This effect stacks if multiple allied Pokémon have it.

name: Wigglytuff
description: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being infatuated.  Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, any wild Pokémon whose species can be either gender has a 2/3 chance of being set to the opposite gender, and a 1/3 chance of having a random gender as usual.

abilities.name: Competitive
abilities.effect: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.
abilities.description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat when a stat is lowered.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals an opposing Pokémon's held item to all participating trainers.  In a double battle, if one opponent has an item, this Pokémon will Frisk that Pokémon; if both have an item, it will Frisk one at random.
abilities.description: The Pokémon can check the foe's held item.

name: Zubat
description: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.effect: This Pokémon cannot flinch.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's moves ignore light screen, reflect, and safeguard.
abilities.description: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

name: Golbat
description: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.effect: This Pokémon cannot flinch.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's moves ignore light screen, reflect, and safeguard.
abilities.description: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

name: Oddish
description: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during strong sunlight.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is always successful fleeing from wild battles, even if trapped by a move or ability.

name: Gloom
description: It secretes a sticky, drool-like honey. Although sweet, it smells too repulsive to get very close.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during strong sunlight.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's damaging moves have a 10% chance to make the target flinch with each hit if they do not already cause flinching as a secondary effect.  This ability does not stack with a held item.  Overworld: The wild encounter rate is halved while this Pokémon is first in the party.

name: Vileplume
description: It has the world's largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during strong sunlight.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being paralyzed, poisoned, or put to sleep, chosen at random.  Nothing is done to compensate if the move's user is immune to one of these ailments; there is simply a lower chance that the move's user will be affected.

name: Paras
description: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by drawing nutrients from the bug host.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being paralyzed, poisoned, or put to sleep, chosen at random.  Nothing is done to compensate if the move's user is immune to one of these ailments; there is simply a lower chance that the move's user will be affected.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage after each turn during strong sunlight, but it heals for 1/8 of its HP each turn during rain.  This Pokémon takes 1.25× as much damage from fire-type moves, but whenever a water move hits it, it heals for 1/4 its maximum HP instead.
abilities.description: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.effect: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.

name: Parasect
description: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being paralyzed, poisoned, or put to sleep, chosen at random.  Nothing is done to compensate if the move's user is immune to one of these ailments; there is simply a lower chance that the move's user will be affected.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage after each turn during strong sunlight, but it heals for 1/8 of its HP each turn during rain.  This Pokémon takes 1.25× as much damage from fire-type moves, but whenever a water move hits it, it heals for 1/4 its maximum HP instead.
abilities.description: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.effect: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.

name: Venonat
description: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is attracted by light at night.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their accuracy.  This ability has no effect on the one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold).  Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, the chance of a wild Pokémon holding a particular item is raised from 50%, 5%, or 1% to 60%, 20%, or 5%, respectively.

abilities.name: Tinted Lens
abilities.effect: This Pokémon deals twice as much damage with moves that are not very effective against the target.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is always successful fleeing from wild battles, even if trapped by a move or ability.

name: Venomoth
description: The dust-like scales covering its wings are color coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is immune to the extra effects of moves used against it.  An extra effect is a move's chance, listed as an "effect chance", to inflict a status ailment, cause a stat change, or make the target flinch in addition to the move's main effect.  For example, thunder shock's paralysis is an extra effect, but thunder wave's is not, nor are knock off's item removal and air cutter's increased critical hit rate.

abilities.name: Tinted Lens
abilities.effect: This Pokémon deals twice as much damage with moves that are not very effective against the target.

abilities.name: Wonder Skin
abilities.effect: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.
abilities.description: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.

name: Diglett
description: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.effect: During a sandstorm, this Pokémon has 1.25× its evasion, and it does not take sandstorm damage regardless of type.  The evasion bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: Arena Trap
abilities.effect: While this Pokémon is in battle, opposing Pokémon cannot flee or switch out.  flying-type Pokémon and Pokémon in the air, e.g. due to levitate or magnet rise, are unaffected.  Pokémon with run away can still flee.  Pokémon can still switch out with the use of a move or item.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.effect: During a sandstorm, this Pokémon's rock-, ground-, and steel-type moves have 1.3× their base power.  This Pokémon does not take sandstorm damage, regardless of type.
abilities.description: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.
